channel.title: CVE Feed for HashThemes -- Smart Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HashThemes -- Smart Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-49270|2024-10-16T13:50:00.477Z -- hashthemes -- smart%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HashThemes Smart Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Smart Blocks: from n/a through 2.0.
